verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4404>morning<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G4160>held<s%> a <S%G4824>consultation<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>council<s%>, and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, and carried him <S%G667>away<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to <S%G4091>Pilate<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>? <S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G3004>sayest<s%> it.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> of many <S%G4183>things<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Answerest <S%G611>thou<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%>? <S%G2396>behold<s%> how many <S%G4214>things<s%> they <S%G2649>witness<s%> against <S%G4675>thee<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3765>yet<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>; <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marvelled<s%>.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> that <S%G1859>feast<s%> he <S%G630>released<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%>, <S%G3746>whomsoever<s%> they <S%G154>desired<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> one <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%>, which lay <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> them that had made insurrection with <S%G4955>him<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G5408>murder<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4714>insurrection<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> crying <S%G310>aloud<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G154>desire<s%> him to do <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G104>ever<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Will <S%G2309>ye<s%> that I <S%G630>release<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?
<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5355>envy<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G383>moved<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> will <S%G2309>ye<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G3004>call<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1063>Why<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> hath he <S%G4160>done<s%>? <S%G1161>And<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out<s%> the more <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%>, <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> so <S%G4091>Pilate<s%>, <S%G1014>willing<s%> to <S%G2425>content<s%> <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%>, <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, when he had <S%G5417>scourged<s%> him, <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G4717>crucified<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G520>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G2080>into<s%> the <S%G833>hall<s%>, <S%G3603>called<s%> <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they call <S%G4779>together<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4686>band<s%>. Praetorium: or, the palace, or, hall of audience

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1746>clothed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G4209>purple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4120>platted<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns<s%>, and put it <S%G4060>about<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> head,
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5463>Hail<s%>, <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>!

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G5180>smote<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the <S%G2776>head<s%> with a <S%G2563>reed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G1716>spit<s%> upon <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>bowing<s%> their <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they took <S%G1562>off<s%> the <S%G4209>purple<s%> from <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1746>put<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1806>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1806>out<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G29>compel<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> a <S%G2956>Cyrenian<s%>, who passed <S%G3855>by<s%>, <S%G2064>coming<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G68>country<s%>, the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4504>Rufus<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, being <S%G3177>interpreted<s%>, The <S%G5117>place<s%> of a <S%G2898>skull<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> mingled with <S%G4669>myrrh<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G2983>received<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G1266>parted<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>, <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> every <S%G5101>man<s%> should <S%G142>take<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1923>superscription<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G156>accusation<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> written <S%G1924>over<s%>, THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> they <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>thieves<s%>; the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> his right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2176>left<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> he was <S%G3049>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G459>transgressors<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they that passed <S%G3899>by<s%> <S%G987>railed<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2795>wagging<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3758>Ah<s%>, thou that <S%G2647>destroyest<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3618>buildest<s%> it <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>,
<S%G4982>Save<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%>.

<S%G1161>Likewise<s%> <S%G3668><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G1702>mocking<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others<s%>; <S%G1438>himself<s%> he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G4982>save<s%>.

<S%G2597>Let<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they that were <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3679>reviled<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1096>when<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> at the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G994>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1682>Eloi<s%>, <S%G1682>Eloi<s%>, <S%G2982>lama<s%> <S%G4518>sabachthani<s%>? <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, being <S%G3177>interpreted<s%>, <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G1519>hast<s%> thou <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>?
<S%G2532>And<s%> some of <S%G5100>them<s%> that stood <S%G3936>by<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, he <S%G5455>calleth<s%> <S%G2243>Elias<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1072>filled<s%> a <S%G4699>spunge<s%> <S%G1072>full<s%> of <S%G3690>vinegar<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> put it <S%G4060>on<s%> a <S%G2563>reed<s%>, and <S%G4222>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4222>drink<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Let <S%G863>alone<s%>; let us <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elias<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2507>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2507>down<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>rent<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1417>twain<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G509>top<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2736>bottom<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when the <S%G2760>centurion<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G1727>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3779>so<s%> cried <S%G2896>out<s%>, and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G230>Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2334>looking<s%> on <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off<s%>: <S%G2532>among<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3398>less<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2500>Joses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4539>Salome<s%>;

<S%G3739>(Who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>;) <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> women <S%G3588>which<s%> came <S%G4872>up<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> when the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, <S%G1893>because<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G3904>preparation<s%>, <S%G3603>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, the day before the <S%G4315>sabbath<s%>,

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G707>Arimathaea<s%>, an <S%G2158>honourable<s%> <S%G1010>counsellor<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4327>waited<s%> <S%G2258>for<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%>, and went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G5111>boldly<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>craved<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marvelled<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2348>were<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2348>dead<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calling<s%> unto him the <S%G2760>centurion<s%>, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he had <S%G599>been<s%> any <S%G3819>while<s%> <S%G599>dead<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when he <S%G1097>knew<s%> it <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2760>centurion<s%>, he <S%G1433>gave<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G59>bought<s%> fine <S%G4616>linen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> took him <S%G2507>down<s%>, and <S%G1750>wrapped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in the <S%G4616>linen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2698>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3419>sepulchre<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2998>hewn<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G4073>rock<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4351>rolled<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G3419>sepulchre<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the mother of <S%G2500>Joses<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he was <S%G5087>laid<s%>.
